headline: Is the Options Market Predicting a Spike in Fortive (FTV) Stock?
summary: Investors need to pay close attention to Fortive (FTV) stock based on the movements in the options market lately.

headline: Fortive to Present at BofA Securities Industrials, Transportation & Airlines Key Leaders Conference
summary: EVERETT, Wash., May 07, 2025--Fortive Corporation ("Fortive") (NYSE: FTV) today announced that James A. Lico, President and Chief Executive Officer, Mark Okerstrom, Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, and Tami Newcombe, President and Chief Executive Officer of Precision Technologies (PT), will be presenting at the BofA Securities Industrials, Transportation & Airlines Key Leaders Conference on Wednesday, May 14th, 2025 at 3:40 p.m. ET (12:40 p.m. PT).
